input: A Scandinavian-style living room with an off-white shag rug, a light wood coffee table, a charcoal fabric sofa, and a large potted ficus in the corner.
edit: Replace the light wood coffee table with a white marble one.
output: A Scandinavian-style living room with an off-white shag rug, a white marble coffee table, a charcoal fabric sofa, and a large potted ficus in the corner.
